title: Plastic Cups, Paper Cups, Disposable Cups and Lids - Restaurantware.com
body: The Bev Tek plastic lids, with their pop-lock design or a 2-in-1 straw or sip design provide style and convenience. Add a splash of whimsy to your to-go drink orders with our Visage 2-in-1 straw or sippy cup lids. Our disposable drinkware range is not just about simplifying your takeaway orders but transforming them into a seamless pleasure.
